title: 11 HR Professionals to Follow on Twitter - Glassdoor for Employers
text:
Subscribe now to get insights from industryexperts delivered straight to your inbox! Got it 
If you are part of the Human Resources (HR) world, looking to grow your network, and stay up to date on industry trends, it’s time to join the Twitter community! You can easily connect and engage with HR professionals for updates and insights on recruiting. 
Ready to get started? Here are 10 HR experts you must follow now: 
1.) Josh Bersin – @Josh_Bersin 
3.) Meghan M. Biro – @MeghanMBiro
